content: @simulacrum took a stab at writing up some docs about zulip here in rust-lang/rust-forge#289 -- I've not read it yet, but maybe people should take a look =)
It's aimed at sort of "intermediate" users I think, i.e., doesn't try too hard to explain Zulip all that much
I left some comments -- most notably I think we should work out our moderation policy
I think the discord policy probably works okay - though I'm not sure if we have enough people around who would be good candidate moderators
I guess maybe the current set of zulip admins is not necessarily bad
I'm not sure what the discord policy is exactly but probably yes it works ok :)
